name: Where is my food?
description:
An entry for Mini Jam 95: Chance

A game made by Anagh's World using React v17.0.2

How to play?

Where is my food? is a simple guessing game where you play as one of the characters - Dog / Fish / Frog / Bunny. 

♥ Based on your character you need to find the respective food. For example, if your character is a dog, then you need to find a bone. 

♥ Based on the difficulty selected, you get 'n' number of chances - Easy: 3 chances, Medium: 2 chances and Hard: 1 chance. 

♥ To complete a level, you need to find the right food for your character. Out of the 4 cards, you need to blindly guess the right food card. 

♥ The game has 5 levels. To win, you need to cross all 5 levels. 

♥ You get a badge for each game you win. You can check your badges in your drawer on the top-left corner. 

♥ The game is especially made for kids to enhance their guessing skills and to understand the 'chance' concept.
